casebody.data:
MITCHELL et al. v. HITCHMAN COAL & COKE CO. (Circuit Court of Appeals, Fourth Circuit. August 15, 1914.) No. 1220. Appeal from the District Court of -the United States for the District of West Virginia, at Philippi. Charles E. Hogg, of Point Pleasant, W. Va., for appellants. Geo. R. E. Gilchrist, of Wheeling, W. Va., for appellee.

Before PRITCHARD, KNAPP, and WOODS, Circuit Judges.

PER CURIAM.

Decree of District Court reversed. 214 Fed. 685, 131 C. C. A. 425. Appeal to the Supreme Court allowed.
